amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for State and local grant programs by $50 million in order to enhance the security of chemical plants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by transfer) by $50 million to state and local governments for the defense of chemical plants by first responders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 198 (Roll no. 176).
